name: product_groups_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consumer_reports.
Tool description: This API helps to query trusted ratings and reviews for the products, cars and services used every day to create a review site such as : consumerreports.org
API description: Fetches a list of product groups based on specified categories and types with optional pagination.

size.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose. Maximum is 500.

productgrouptypeid.description: The value of productGroupTypeId field returned right in this endpoint

page.description: The page index starting from 0 for pagination purposes.

parentproductgroupid.description: The ID of the parent product group to filter the results.
